hero.title: ‡§ï‡§æ‡§∞‡•Ä‡§ó‡§∞‡•Ä: Where Ancient Craft Meets Modern Innovation
hero.subtitle: Celebrating India's rich heritage of craftsmanship through AI-powered storytelling. From the sculptures of Khajuraho to the textiles of Varanasi, help your traditional art find its voice in the digital age.

features.title: How AI Honors Your Traditional Craft
features.heritageStorytellingDesc: Share the ancient wisdom behind your craft - from temple carvings to royal patronage, let AI weave your family traditions into compelling narratives.
features.spiritualCraftNarrativesDesc: Transform descriptions into sacred stories - connecting your brass lamps to temple rituals, your textiles to festival celebrations.
features.culturalDigitalPresenceDesc: Create content that celebrates your regional heritage - showcase the Rajasthani, Bengali, or South Indian roots of your craft.
features.festivalMarketIntelligenceDesc: Understand when to showcase your diyas for Diwali, your rangoli tools for festivals, timing your craft for India's celebration calendar.
features.heritageBasedTargetingDesc: Connect with customers who appreciate traditional craftsmanship - from temple architecture enthusiasts to cultural heritage lovers.
features.glocalHeritageReachDesc: Share India's artistic legacy globally while staying rooted in local traditions - from village crafts to international appreciation.

cta.title: Ready to Honor Your Heritage with Technology?
cta.subtitle: Join the Kaarigari community where traditional Indian craftsmen embrace AI to share their ancestral wisdom with the world.

helpCenter.title: Help Centre
helpCenter.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and get the support you need
helpCenter.noFaqsAvailable: No FAQs available at the moment.

browse.searchFilter: How to search and filter products
browse.searchFilterDesc: Use our search bar to find specific items. Apply filters by category, price range, location, or artisan to narrow down results. You can also browse by featured collections or trending items.
browse.artisanProfilesDesc: Each artisan has a verified profile showing their story, craftsmanship style, location, and customer reviews. Look for the verified badge to ensure authenticity.
browse.customizationDesc: Many artisans offer customization services. Look for the 'Customizable' tag on products. Contact the artisan directly through our messaging system to discuss your requirements.
browse.productDetailsDesc: Product descriptions include materials used, dimensions, care instructions, and shipping information. Check the 'Product Details' section for complete specifications.

orders.howToOrderDesc: 1. Add items to your cart 2. Review your cart and apply any coupons 3. Enter shipping information 4. Select payment method 5. Review and confirm your order
orders.paymentMethodsDesc: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are secured with SSL encryption for your safety.
orders.modificationsDesc: Orders can be modified within 1 hour of placement. After this time, contact the artisan directly or our support team for assistance.
orders.shippingChargesDesc: Shipping costs vary by item size, weight, destination, and artisan location. Costs are calculated at checkout. Many artisans offer free shipping for orders over a certain amount.

tracking.howToTrackDesc: Once shipped, you'll receive a tracking number via email and SMS. Use the 'Track Order' feature in your account or enter the tracking number on our tracking page.
tracking.deliveryTimesDesc: Standard delivery: 5-7 business days. Express delivery: 2-3 business days. International orders: 10-15 business days. Custom orders may take longer as specified by the artisan.
tracking.delaysDesc: If your order is delayed, check your tracking information first. Contact our support team if there are no updates for more than 2 days beyond the expected delivery date.
tracking.receivingDesc: Inspect your items upon delivery. If there are any issues, report them within 48 hours. Keep the original packaging for potential returns or exchanges.

returns.policyDesc: Returns are accepted within 30 days of delivery for unused items in original condition. Custom or personalized items may not be returnable - check with the artisan.
returns.howToReturnDesc: Go to 'My Orders' in your account, select the item to return, choose a reason, and follow the instructions. You'll receive a return shipping label via email.
returns.refundProcessDesc: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive your returned item. The refund will be credited to your original payment method.
returns.damagedItemsDesc: Report damaged or incorrect items within 48 hours of delivery. We'll arrange for replacement or full refund including return shipping costs.

faqs.authenticity: How do I verify artisan authenticity?
faqs.authenticityDesc: All artisans go through our verification process. Look for the verified badge, read reviews, and check their profile story and portfolio.
faqs.outOfStock: What if an item is out of stock?
faqs.outOfStockDesc: You can add out-of-stock items to your wishlist to get notified when they're available. You can also message the artisan to ask about restocking timelines.
faqs.customOrders: How long do custom orders take?
faqs.customOrdersDesc: Custom order timelines vary by artisan and complexity. The estimated completion time is shown on the product page. You can track progress through your account.
faqs.cancellationDesc: Orders can be cancelled within 1 hour of placement for a full refund. After this time, cancellation depends on the artisan's policy and order status.
faqs.care: How do I care for artisan products?
faqs.careDesc: Care instructions are provided with each product. Generally, handmade items require gentle care. Avoid harsh chemicals and follow the specific guidelines provided.

support.liveChatDesc: Our live chat is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST. Click the chat icon in the bottom right corner for instant support.
support.emailDesc: Send us an email at support@artisanmarketplace.com. We respond within 24 hours during business days.
support.phoneDesc: Call us at 1-800-ARTISAN (1-800-278-4726) for urgent matters. Phone support is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 5 PM EST.
support.contactFormDesc: Use our contact form for detailed inquiries. Include your order number and relevant details for faster assistance.

tutorials.gettingStartedDesc: Watch our 5-minute introduction video to learn how to navigate the marketplace, create an account, and place your first order.
tutorials.artisanStoriesDesc: Discover the stories behind our artisans, their craft traditions, and the cultural significance of their work. Each story provides context about the products you're purchasing.
tutorials.careGuidesDesc: Learn how to properly care for different types of artisan products with our step-by-step video guides covering textiles, ceramics, jewelry, and more.
tutorials.platformFeaturesDesc: Detailed guide on using advanced features like wishlists, custom orders, artisan messaging, and account settings.
